comment._content: love the tram in this shot. bring back trams to sydney!

comment.author: 60203677@N04
comment._content: 50 years since the original trams ceased on 25 Feb 1961.  Wonderful celebrations were held at the Sydney Tramway Museum over the weekend of 26/7 Feb 2011.

comment.author: 63385174@N06
comment._content: Tram shed on right still exists as the bus shelter on Elizabeth Street, corner Park Street.
